data.message: Jesus loves you and so do I. He's going to save you because we believe in you as you have believed in him. It's not seen so much in your raps but he sees what no one else does, the deepest parts of your heart. Give him your pain and sufferings,he wants it. Talk to him.

replies.message: Marshall already knows Jesus, just listening to his cd 19946. I knew and they said it on google. It's in the lyrics... I have known him since 4 yrs old. And never pushed him on anyone. You can see it in his spirit.

Some one who wright music and say that he sould his soul to the devil,that is because many famouse people made pakts with satan making bad things and sacrificess and choose not God but devil ,serving him . That people can be very rich and famouse but they will burn in hell if they not regrate and accept Jesus as son of God
